ShadowSiren:VeilStance.NAME: Veil
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal half damage and you take half damage from attacks.

ShadowSiren:AbyssStance.NAME: Abyss
DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a card, draw #b1 card and apply #b1 #yDrench to a random enemy (once per turn per unique cost). NL At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock equal to the number of cards in your hand.

ShadowSiren:SmokeStance.NAME: Smoke
DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand at the end of your turn. NL Upon taking unblocked attack damage, discard your hand and reduce the damage taken for each card discarded this way.

ShadowSiren:HyperStance.NAME: Hyper
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal #b20% more damage and you take #b20% less damage from attacks. NL Upon exiting this #yStance, gain 2 #yCharge.

ShadowSiren:HugeStance.NAME: Huge
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal double damage. NL Lose [E] each time you play an attack.
